website_summaries.verdict: An adorable plush toy set with all the cutest cast members. Ideal for fans who are too young for role play or older kids looking for authentic assistants and patients.
pros: Set includes all the most popular characters, including Lambie, Stuffy, Hallie, and Chilly
Soft, snuggly, and beautifully made with convincing details
Size is just right for most kids
not too big and not too small
High quality, officially licensed plush toys
cons: A handful of parents wished they were just a bit bigger

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but you’re paying top dollar for your kid liking the show....
customer_reviews.text: These guys are cute and fun for a little show fan to play with and make up their own doc adventures but honestly the price point is high - though most such branded toys are...
customer_reviews.author: llaveabejas

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Loves Doc & Her Crew!
customer_reviews.text: This comes with only the crew of Doc McStuffins & my toddler loves playing with them! Super cute, we’ve had them a year and they haven’t fallen apart! And she can be rough with them.
customer_reviews.author: @TheBossBets

customer_reviews.title: Cute but expensive.
customer_reviews.text: For the price these should have been bigger. They are about as tall as a Barbie doll. If my daughter was super obsessed with the show I would have never bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price. Small collectors items rather than plush toys for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Toys are extremely small especially for the price. Seems to be made of quality material which is nice but still not functional. The toys are very stiff and they seem more like collectors items for a shelf rather than toys for kids to play with. All the characters actually look like the characters on the show except for the lamb. Overall disappointed due to the high cost for such small toys.
customer_reviews.author: MommyC

customer_reviews.title: sweet stuffed animals
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES Doc McStuffins, so this was the perfect Christmas gift for her! She walks around the house with all of them, or just one of them. And she even shares them with her baby brother.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved the product
customer_reviews.text: this little 3 yr. old LOVES Dr. McStuffins. She had the doctors kit so when I gave her the stuffed "patients" she was taking their blood pressure, giving them shots, she was so engrossed, she never talked for one hour! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: JANE E. HOMBURG

customer_reviews.title: Big price small toys
customer_reviews.text: Very small for the price. Thought these would be bigger but they’re very small.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: For Doc McStuffins Fans!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my niece and she was SO happy! When I bought this item, I had the idea they would be a bit larger, but upon arrival, I realized their actual size was perfect. Plus, they were really soft! Awesome present for any Doc McStuffins fan!
customer_reviews.author: Trinidad

customer_reviews.title: great for babies too
customer_reviews.text: my 11 month old daughter loves them . most of them are 6" tall. I know she is too young but she's happy when she sees them.
customer_reviews.author: ruben t.

customer_reviews.title: Cute Toys were a Big Hit
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter received these for her 4th birthday and she just LOVES them!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Lagowski

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Doc Mcstuffins is huge in our house! These plush toys are made to last and look exactly like the characters from the show. The size is just right and my girls love play for hours and hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my granddaughter for her 4th birthday. She absolutely loves them! I highly recommend for any child who likes Doc McStuffins!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Shepard Gleason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: True to description. They was well and have endured constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Tanuja Adiani

customer_reviews.title: Daughter must love them
customer_reviews.text: My daughter enjoy Doc McStuffins everyday on TV. She cannot meet these soft toys until the Christmas day. But she must love them. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: loku

customer_reviews.title: True to show
customer_reviews.text: 3 year old granddaughter loves the Doc Mcstuffins show and loved the play friends
customer_reviews.author: Jerry R.

customer_reviews.title: So happy with these
customer_reviews.text: So happy with these, my daughter absolutely loves Doc Mcstuffins and she plays with these daily. They are the perfect size for her and are made extremely tough!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Jo Deal

customer_reviews.title: Doc McStuffins Kid
customer_reviews.text: Our kid loves Doc and has all the McStuffins toys and won’t put them down 4 months later
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Not all Disney products
customer_reviews.text: Cute, well made and the correct characters but the Halle the hippo didn't have a Disney tag like the other 3 and she's smaller than the others also. Can't return because I don't have the time before my daughters birthday and they will pass a 3 year olds inspection but I wouldn't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ormonde

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Loved them! Perfect size for toddlers and so cute! Just like the cartoon, I love these little guys and so does my little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Brown

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 4yo daughter who is Doc McStuffins for Halloween. They are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Raines

customer_reviews.title: A bit expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my niece! She loves it! The toys are relatively well made and they feel nice. They are a bit small but she still loves it. The price is a bit high in my mind but my niece's smile is worth every cent!
customer_reviews.author: P. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Small but decent toy. Be very careful with Hallie’s bow!,
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, though be warned that the bow on the back of Hallie’s dress fell off within 10 minutes and would definitely have been a choke hazard if given to baby and hadn’t been attention. Does have Disney tags. But agree with other reviewers that they are smaller than I expected for the price.. that said, my 3 year old loves them and their size makes them easier to store anyway so will keep them.
customer_reviews.author: bbd

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: This wasa gift to my granddaughter and she loved them!
customer_reviews.author: pjojohnson7

product_meta.title: Disney Junior Jr Doc McStuffins CHILLY Snowman Bean Bag Plush & Hallie Hippo Bean Bag Plush & Stuffy Dragon Beanbag Plush and Lambie Beanbag Plush Doll
feature_bullets: Disney Plush Doc Mcstuffins Chilly Doll, Stuffy Doll, Hallie Doll and Lambie Doll
